item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo Compartment Smoke Detection System Detectors (Forward, Aft) – Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – Both Detectors Per Smoke Zone Inoperative – Empty Cargo Handling Equipment Only

remarks.para: Both detectors (loops A and B) per smoke zone may be inoperative provided procedures are established and used to verify associated cargo compartment remains empty, or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Associated cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "LOWER LOBE COMP SMOKE DET LOOP A (or B) IS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
